answers.answer: I had it. I was extremly thirsty all the time and tired. The dont test until 27-29 weeks though

I don't know about GD but I am wondering about you being tired.  I know that I sleep all night and feel like I could fall asleep at a drop of a hat...I am 20w2d and I was chipper and awake with my first one and this one I am dead to the world...I was thinking maybe my iron was low...not sure though.

I know what you mean.  I am EXHAUSTED all the time.  This is baby #2 for me as well. With my DS I was hardly tired at all.  This time like you said, I could fall asleep at any given time.  I dont know what's going on.  I am ready to test for GD so I can atleast knock that out if thats not it.  I am 20W 4D....what is your EDD??

I had one Glucose test already at 11 weeks. My dr.s office takes it seriously they said. But with my DS, I had that test at 5 months. I hope everything is alright with you!!! Take it easy and if you still feel that way this weekend, call your Dr. on Monday! I have been really thristy but not tired. I think the baby is wanting more fluids...lol! Take Care sweetie!

This could just be from my cold.  My body needs more fluids since I am sick AGAIN!  Its all in my chest...it sucks so bad.  I thought I was gonna cough up a lung this morning.  It was terrible and hurt so bad.  I cant even take a deep breath without it hurting like hell!  I am just gonna wait until my appt on Monday and mention it.

hi steph!i had those symptoms too, before they tested me for diabetes. I was soooooo thirsty all the time, and tired too. I cant think of any other symptoms. But i was dionased with G/d around 12 wks. blah! And he put me on a diet, etc, etc. and i had been keeping to the diet pretty good, even had to go on insulin..not bad though, i thought it'd be worse. just expensive.lately i've been slippin with the diet, eaten out to much.i haven't gained any weight yet, not unless this eating out this wk probably hsn't helped..but i think they usually test for g/d around 28 wks, but u could tell your dr about your symptoms, and he may test earlier. if you do have g/d u defintily want to know so u can keep it under control. Baby can be born very big due to untreated g/d. and that's not good for baby, so much sugar, it's more than babys body can handle, my dr explained and that's the reason for large baby..but the thirst could just be a symptom from u being dehydrated from being sick, i dk?well i hope u feel better real soon!

HeyMy EDD is 14 March...not far from each other...I am having a little boy, how about you?I have a doctors appointment on the 14th of Nov so I am going to say something about it.  I am in the military so its not like I can just leave work when I feel like it...
My EDD is March 13 and yes I am having a little boy too!  That is so weird huh?!?  Where do you live??
I am living in Washington DC/Virgina right now but I am from PAYou?
I live in PA, but I am from Louisiana.  Where at in PA are you from??
A small place called Bernville, Not far from Reading/Kutztown...You...I was down in Mississippi for 5 years...miss it terrably.

I am from the Western side of PA.  Kittanning, does that ring a bell??  Yea someone else on here was from Kutztown.  That is so crazy.  So do you have a name picked yet for your boy??  I know what you mean, I miss Louisiana too.  I hate the snow!!

Not too familiar with Western PA...but I do remember seeing someone on here from Kutztown at one time also.We are going to name him Sean Kenneth Larsen...and you?I told my DH not to get to excited that they say its a boy cause they gave me a really bad picture and you can't really tell what it is...I am bringing it to the doctor's on the 14th and maybe she'll take a look for me.  If not I am having a 3D one done on 8 Dec...So that will definately confirm...With my first the told me that it was a girl on 2 different occasions and then on the 3rd U/S he started peeing and there was not denying that it was a boy!
We dont have a name picked out yet.  My DH cant make up his mind.  But I want Bradley or David as the middle name.
You'll come up with something.  I was set on the middle name of Bryan for my DS...so we had to work around that but didn't come up with a name until 30 min...before he was born...

question: Was anyone diagnosed with this??  I was just wondering what the signs are.  I have been so thirsty lately and tired.  I know being thristy alot is one but I wasnt sure if there was anything else.  Also, when do you go for your glucose test?  I cant remember?  Please help me ladies!!Thanks
title: What are the signs of gestational diabetes??
